named-query.name: Module.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Module t order by t.id

named-query.name: Module.findByName
named-query.query: select t from Module t where t.name=:name

named-query.name: Module.findByCode
named-query.query: select t from Module t where t.code=:code

named-query.name: Dict.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Dict t order by t.listOrder, t.id

named-query.name: Dict.findByName
named-query.query: select t from Dict t where t.name=:name

named-query.name: Dict.findByCode
named-query.query: select t from Dict t where t.code=:code

named-query.name: Adm.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Adm t order by t.id

named-query.name: Adm.findByName
named-query.query: select t from Adm t where t.name=:name

named-query.name: Adm.findByCode
named-query.query: select t from Adm t where t.code=:code

named-query.name: Media.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Media t order by t.id

named-query.name: Media.findByName
named-query.query: select t from Media t where t.name=:name

named-query.name: Media.findByCode
named-query.query: select t from Media t where t.code=:code
